column4: I have a wifi problem. My ubuntu somehow thinks I have like 25 network controlers (with each being the same). Is there a way to reset it somehow. Restarting doesnt solve it the problem
there is someway (but i don't know it), to reset udev to re-enumerate stuff... but sorry i've once done it a couple times to rename eth1 back to eth0... but don't know the steps off hand
